projects.title: ThinhPay - Digital Payment Platform
projects.description: A Modular Monolith fintech system simulating core banking operations. Built with Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and Hexagonal Architecture. Features secure RESTful APIs, JWT authentication, and Redis caching. Full-stack with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend.

projects.title: HCMUE Course Registration System
projects.description: Full-stack course registration system for HCMUE university. Built with React + TypeScript frontend using Redux Toolkit for state management. Django REST API backend with PostgreSQL on Neon. Containerized with Docker for easy deployment.

projects.title: KaraokeHKT - Management System
projects.description: Full-stack karaoke venue management system with booking, room management, and billing features. ReactJS frontend deployed on Vercel, ASP.NET Core Web API backend for robust business logic.

projects.title: Java E-Commerce Keyboard Platform
projects.description: Fullstack e-commerce platform migrated to Java Spring ecosystem. RESTful backend with Spring Boot, Repository Pattern and Spring Data JPA. Secure authentication using Spring Security and JWT.

projects.title: Knowledge Graph for STEM Education
projects.description: Research project applying Neo4j for knowledge graph modeling to structure complex educational data. Web application powered by Spring Data Neo4j for efficient graph queries.
